an4.211:4.1: “Mendicants, these four things corrupt an assembly.
an4.211:4.3: A monk, nun, layman, or laywoman who is unethical, of bad character.
an4.211:4.7: These are the four things that corrupt an assembly.
an4.211:5.1: “Mendicants, these four things light up an assembly.
an4.211:5.3: A monk, nun, layman, or laywoman who is ethical, of good character.
an4.211:5.7: These are the four things that light up an assembly.”
